summary: Use this Open API to get all vehicle list
description: Use this Open API to get all vehicle list.

query.name: compatibility_details
query.description: To inform compatibility list, can be equal to Brand, Model, Year, or Version. Pass the compatibility_details="Brand" to get all brand list; Pass the compatibility_details="Model" and brand_id=1234 to get all model list under brand_id=1234; Pass the compatibility_details="Year" and brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 to get all year list under brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345; Pass the compatibility_details="Version" and brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 and year_id=3456 to get all version list under brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 and year_id=3456.

query.name: language
query.description: If language is not uploaded, the default language=en, the following are the languages supported by different markets SG: en ; MY: en / ms-my / zh-hans ; TH: en / th ; VN: en / vi ; PH: en ; TW: en / zh-hant ; ID: en / id ; BR: en / pt-br ; MX: en / es-mx ; CO: en/es-CO ; CL: en/es-CL. Note: For markets that have already launched global tree, Crossboard shop only support returning en and zh-hans language data.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/get_vehicle_list_by_compatibility_detail?access_token=access_token&brand_id=1234&compatibility_details=Brand&language=pt-br&model_id=2345&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp&year_id=3456',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
